TopicTitle: Building the VAB in Minecraft, in 1:1 Scale

Articles.Content: I, with several other people, have been working on building the VAB in Minecraft in 1:1 scale for a while, and we finally declared it finished (enough). So I made a video to show it off. I hope you enjoy

This is pretty impressive.

Now all you need is to put a rocket inside

Ha! I thought about it. I very nearly did it for the video. But I found that building rockets that 1x1 meter blocks don't lend themselves to building things that are use fractions of a meter (2.5, 3.75m), though I suppose I could have fudged it. It's rather amazing how SMALL most (KSP) rockets would be within the building though.

I was under the first, if not the only person that died during the project because I refused to fly around and help with the darn thing

But the Video has become a great documentary of what persistence can accomplish.

Give Fleet some reputation for it
